title: RP Gifting
body:
Hello.

I want to gift my friend RP. I read the instructions but maybe I'm understanding incorrectly. Can we not gift more than 5 RP at a time?

I want to gift him 5000 RP so he can get himself a bunch of content, specifically some of the Lunar revel bundles.

replies.body: Once you enter the recipient and gift type, you can enter a personal message. After this screen you hit the send button and a new window will pop up with payment methods and RP amounts you can buy. Are you having issues somewhere along the way?

Ah okay. I didn't know about that part. I assumed the message was the last part just like when you gift a champ or a skin.

Thank you very much for the response.
